Text: houston chronicle interview requestHi Jeff Thought Id ask again if youd be willing to talk to me about your decision to step down Theres much interest among our readers in you Thanks Laura Laura Goldberg Business Reporter Houston Chronicle fax

Houston Chronicle interviewHi Jeff Id love to sit down and talk with you in more detail about your decision to leave Enron If at any point you feel comfortable talking about it how about doing so in the Chronicle Im sure youre aware of the speculation and rumors out there and how thats hurting the stock Talking to me would be an opportunity for you to stop the negative chatter Aside from that I think theres a genuine interest in the community in your decision Im sure there are plenty of executives at other companies who would love to read to about it and wish they had the guts to do what you did End of pitch Laura Laura Goldberg Business Reporter Houston Chronicle fax
